title: Customer Service Associate
details_list: Candidates should have Certificate/Diploma/Degree in computer operations/Language/ should have studied Computer / Information Technology as one of the subjects in the High School/College/Institute.
The examination will be held in two phases, Online Preliminary and Online Main Examinations.
Candidate should be proficient in (reading, writing, speaking, and understanding) the local language of the State/UT they apply for.
